newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian bus fire kills six children.
newsitem.headline: Indian bus fire kills six children.

text.p: At least six children were killed and eleven seriously burned when a bus caught fire in the northern Indian state of Haryana, the United News of India (UNI) said on Monday.

The incident occured on Sunday evening near Akoda village, some 100 kilometers (62.5 miles) northwest of New Delhi, when a petrol can kept near the bus engine caught fire and the flames roared through the vehicle, UNI said.
The injured were admitted to a local hospital, it reported.
The bus was carrying 40 children, it said without elaborating.
